title: 为什么启动不了
author: 浪の
txt_content:
为什么启动不了？ 献上日志

[13:21:18][main/INFO] Initialized settings.
[13:21:21][UpdateChecker/WARN] Failed to get update url.

replies.author: MyKtw
replies.txt_content:
HMCL提示无法获取更新地址尝试换个下载源或者下载HMCL最新的开发版
下载地址https://hmcl.huangyuhui.net/download
